content.rendered:
The 40,000 to 44,000 lb excavator is a great tool for any excavating or earthmoving task. Primary applications include backfilling; lifting or relocating large quantities of soil, rubble, or dirt; transporting heavy materials; digging foundations; or grading tasks. This excavator allows operators to easily transport materials where they need to from a fixed location. As an all-purpose earthmoving machine, this excavator is frequently used by construction teams for long-term construction, industrial or maintenance projects.

  • Ideal for general construction or industrial projects
  • Great for transporting materials
  • Boom provides extended reach capability
